a short hike:
jump <color=#999>(press)</color>
glide <color=#999>(hold)</color>
flap wings <color=#999>(midair+<color=#F82>feather</color>)</color>
climb <color=#999>(hold+face wall+<color=#F82>feather</color>)</color>

奔跑 <color=#999>（按住+<color=#F82>羽毛</color>+<color=#C55>跑鞋</color>）</color>
